definitions.definition: ( law ) Synonym of tort law ( “ the area of law dealing with wrongful acts , whether intentional or negligent , regarded as non-criminal and unrelated to contracts , which cause injuries and can be remedied in civil courts , usually through the awarding of damages ” ) .

main_definition: ( law ) Synonym of tort law ( “ the area of law dealing with wrongful acts , whether intentional or negligent , regarded as non-criminal and unrelated to contracts , which cause injuries and can be remedied in civil courts , usually through the awarding of damages ” ) .
